author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Gear up for race day! This plugin highlights the upcoming Grand Prix with circuit details, location, date, and a slick track image.

It was created by Daniel Sitnik, Principal Architect @ Accenture Brazil and creator of small things. Want a custom TRMNL Plugin for you? Check my ko-fi link below or e-mail me! ðŸ™‚

custom_fields.name: Latitude
custom_fields.description: The latitude of your location
custom_fields.help_text: Go to https://www.latlong.net, search for the desired place or navigate using the map, then copy the latitude.

custom_fields.name: Longitude
custom_fields.description: The longitude of your location
custom_fields.help_text: Go to https://www.latlong.net, search for the desired place or navigate using the map, then copy the longitude.

custom_fields.name: Temperature Unit
custom_fields.description: Select the desired temperature unit

custom_fields.name: Location Name
custom_fields.description: Give a name to help identify this location (eg: home, office, city name, etc.)
custom_fields.help_text: This name will be displayed at the right side of the plugin title bar.

custom_fields.name: Shortcut URL
custom_fields.description:
Import this shortcut on your iPhone or iPad.
Set up automations to trigger it at 00:05 and when Reminders is closed.
You will need to know the UUID of this plugin instance while importing.

custom_fields.name: Dates and Times
custom_fields.description: Do you want dates/times shown for reminders?

custom_fields.name: List Names
custom_fields.description: Do you want list names shown for reminders?

custom_fields.name: Notes
custom_fields.description: Do you want notes shown for reminders?

custom_fields.name: Tags
custom_fields.description: Do you want tags shown for reminders?

custom_fields.name: Date Formatting
custom_fields.description: How do you want dates to be formatted? (will have no effect if dates are not shown)

custom_fields.name: Display Day Names?
custom_fields.description: Do you want day names shown in front of dates? (will have no effect if dates are not shown)

custom_fields.name: Time Formatting
custom_fields.description: How do you want times to be formatted? (will have no effect if times are not shown)

custom_fields.name: Right Label
custom_fields.description: What do you want shown on the right of the title bar?

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Hourly weather forecast plugin with Open-Meteo Backend. No API key required.
NOTE: Click save right after plugin import, to populate the required fields to fetch the weather data. Otherwise you will get "Liquid error" messages.
Report bugs and translation issues on GitHub link below.

custom_fields.name: About This Plugin
custom_fields.description:
Hourly weather forecast plugin with Open-Meteo Backend. No API key required.
NOTE: Click save right after plugin import, to populate the required fields to fetch the weather data. Otherwise you will get "Liquid error" messages.
Report bugs and translation issues on GitHub link below.

custom_fields.name: Latitude
custom_fields.description: Latitude of your location
custom_fields.help_text: Google "lat lon <city name>" to find your coordinates

custom_fields.name: Longitude
custom_fields.description: Longitude of your location
custom_fields.help_text: Google "lat lon <city name>" to find your coordinates

custom_fields.name: Language
custom_fields.description: Display language

custom_fields.name: Temperature Unit
custom_fields.description: Temperature unit to use

custom_fields.name: Date Format Today
custom_fields.description: Format for today's date in strftime format

custom_fields.name: Date Format Tomorrow
custom_fields.description: Format for tomorrow's date in strftime format

custom_fields.name: Full Display: Today's Max Hours
custom_fields.description: Number of hours to display for today's hourly temperature, counting from current hour. For Full and Half Horizontal Display mode.

custom_fields.name: Full Display: Tomorrow's Hours
custom_fields.description: Comma-separated list of hours to display for tomorrow. For Full and Half Horizontal Display mode.

custom_fields.name: Half Vertical Display: Today's Max Hours
custom_fields.description: Number of hours to display for today's hourly temperature. For Half Vertical Display mode.
